description: Spirit's bankruptcy filing will affect airfares across the board, whether you fly Spirit or not, experts say.
title: What does Spirit Airlines' bankruptcy mean for you?

description: Black, Hispanic and LGBTQ+ Americans across the U.S. say they received offensive text messages after the 2024 elections. CBS News Confirmed executive editor Rhona Tarrant breaks down what's known about the racist and insulting remarks.
title: What we know about offensive text messages sent to Americans after 2024 elections

description: Robert F. Kennedy's Jr. push to remove fluoride from the nation's public water supply could benefit some companies. Here's why.
title: Dental company stocks jump amid RFK Jr.'s health claims about fluoride

description: President-elect Donald Trump announced he selected former Florida Rep. Matt Gaetz to serve as attorney general.
title: House Ethics Committee to meet Wednesday amid growing pressure to release Gaetz report

description: Russian officials are reacting to President Biden's move to allow Ukraine to fire U.S.-made and supplied missiles deeper into Russia, a request that Ukraine's Volodymyr Zelenskyy has been making for some time. CBS News' Charlie D'Agata reports.
title: Could Biden's decision on Ukraine weapons use be start of world war with Russia?

description: There are reports of a potential gathering of the House Ethics Committee to discuss the investigation into former Florida Rep. Matt Gaetz. CBS News' Nikole Killion has more on the probe and its findings possibly being made public.
title: House Ethics Committee may meet on Gaetz report

description: A draft of the House Ethics report on former Florida Rep. Matt Gaetz could be leaked if it's not released to the public. Mia McCarthy, a politics reporter at POLITICO, joins CBS News with more on how the findings may emerge.
title: What will happen to the Gaetz House Ethics report?

description: The Pacific Northwest could see about 12 inches of rain as a storm moves near the West Coast. CBS News Bay Area meteorologist Jessica Burch breaks down the latest weather forecast.
title: Storms, heavy rain to slam Pacific Northwest

description: President-elect Donald Trump is standing by his team picks as he prepares for a second term in the White House. CBS News' Olivia Rinaldi breaks down how Trump is handling critiques over his choice for secretary of defense, and the latest on his choice to head the Energy Department.
title: What to know about Trump's team picks as Hegseth allegations take focus

description: The Spirit Airlines bankruptcy news may not affect holiday travel but could limit some service options in the future due to cost-cutting measures. CBS News MoneyWatch correspondent Kelly O'Grady has more on the airline, and new details on the stock market rally after the 2024 elections.
title: Will Spirit Airlines bankruptcy disrupt holiday travel?

description: The Northwest is bracing for a strong storm system to move in this week, fueled by an atmospheric river​ and bomb cyclone. What do those terms mean?
title: A bomb cyclone and atmospheric river are developing in the Pacific

description: Home equity loan interest rates are falling, but is it worth waiting for them to drop further? Here's what to know.
title: 4 risks of waiting for home equity loan interest rates to fall further

description: In a shift in policy, President Biden authorized Ukraine's use of American-made long-range weapons inside of Russia. Ukraine has been requesting the missiles since the start of the war, but the U.S. has refused until now. On Sunday, Russia launched one of its largest attacks in months on Ukrainian civilians as there are fears this could escalate the conflict.
title: Biden approves Ukraine's use of U.S.-made long-range weapons inside Russia

description: Biden signals U.S. support for Ukrainian sovereignty; Prosecutors accuse Sean "Diddy" Combs of blackmailing potential witnesses from jail.
title: Nov 18: CBS News 24/7, 1pm ET

description: If you want to settle your credit card debt for less than what you owe, make sure to avoid these big mistakes.

description: Officials say 13 people were shot during two incidents along a New Orleans "second line" parade route. CBS News' Kati Weis breaks down what's known.
title: Latest news on shootings near New Orleans parade route

description: President Biden reiterated support for Ukraine in the war against Russia during the G20 Summit in Brazil. This comes as Russian officials react to Mr. Biden's decision to allow Ukraine to use U.S.-made and supplied missiles deeper into Russia. CBS News' Willie J. Inman reports.
title: Biden reiterates support for Ukraine while at G20 Summit

description: With the price of gold high, some buyers may be considering skipping it this holiday season. Here's what to consider.
title: Is gold still worth buying this holiday season?

description: Kennedy insists he is not "anti-vaccine," but he has a long record of false and misleading statements​ about their safety and benefits. What could he do as Trump's HHS secretary?
title: How RFK Jr. could impact vaccines as Trump's HHS secretary

description: Canada's Bestar recalled wall beds only after learning of dozens of cases in which its beds detached from the walls, feds say.
title: Bed maker waited to report defect that killed 1 and injured others

description: Jose Ibarra's trial for the murder of Laken Riley, a student at Georgia's Augusta University College of Nursing, continues as Ibarra's family members are expected to testify on his behalf. CBS News contributor Caroline Polisi breaks down the latest in the case.
title: Laken Riley murder trial defense witnesses may include Jose Ibarra's family

description: Home equity loan interest rates have been on a steady downward path all year. Here's what to know now.
title: How far have home equity loan interest rates fallen in 2024?

description: The stars of Ridley Scott's "Gladiator II" discuss the film's legacy and stepping back into the world of ancient Rome.

description: President Biden's decision to allow Ukraine to fire U.S.-made and supplied missiles deeper into Russia could elicit a sharp response from Russian President Vladimir Putin. CBS News contributor Sam Vinograd breaks down the reactions to Biden's shift in policy and what could happen next.
title: Why Russian officials say Biden's latest move could lead to world war

description: E. coli outbreaks in food are making headlines, prompting questions about how to stay safe from the bacteria that can cause sickness.

description: If your credit card debt is delinquent and is now in the hands of a debt collector, here's what to know.
title: 3 important things to know if your credit card debt goes to collections

description: A skydiver was found dead in northwestern Louisiana over the weekend after his parachute failed to deploy, authorities said.
title: Missing skydiver found dead miles from intended landing spot in Louisiana

description: President-elect Donald Trump's Cabinet picks, particularly Pete Hegseth and Matt Gaetz, have stirred up controversy on Capitol Hill. CBS News congressional correspondent Scott MacFarlane has more on what kind of opposition Trump's choices could be up against during their potential confirmations.
title: What the confirmation process looks like for Trump Cabinet picks like Hegseth, Gaetz

description: Two people were killed in two separate shootings along a New Orleans parade route Sunday night. No arrests have been made so far. CBS News national reporter Kati Weis has more.
title: What we know about the separate shootings along New Orleans parade route

description: Social media platform Bluesky has seen a rise in users in recent weeks as an alternative to X, formerly known as Twitter. On Thursday, the platform reported more than a million users had signed up in a single day. Jay Peters, news editor for the Verge, joined CBS News to discuss Bluesky.
title: Bluesky picking up steam as alternative to X

description: Failed sales and mergers and an engine recall that forced dozens of jets to be grounded have pushed Spirit Airlines to file for bankruptcy. CBS News senior transportation correspondent Kris Van Cleave has more on what this news means for air travel.
title: Flights not impacted after Spirit Airlines files for bankruptcy

description: Even as cease-fire negotiations continued, Israel's offensive against Hezbollah in Lebanon moved forward over the weekend with a strike over Beirut that killed the militant group's media relations chief. CBS News senior foreign correspondent Elizabeth Palmer has more.
title: Hezbollah media chief killed in Israeli strike as talks continue for possible cease-fire

description: Biden approves Ukraine's use of U.S.-made long-range weapons inside Russia; Spirit airlines files for bankruptcy and flights are not impacted.
title: Nov 18 : CBS News 24/7, 10am ET

description: Ballet dancer Vladimir Shklyarov fell from a fifth-floor balcony after taking painkillers ahead of back surgery, Russian media reported.
title: Famed ballet dancer dies in fall from balcony in Russia

description: Jose Ibarra, the man accused in the brutal murder of 22-year-old nursing student Laken Riley, is back in a Georgia courtroom. CBS News producer Jared Eggleston has the latest on the case.
title: Police investigation takes focus in murder trial for man accused of killing Laken Riley

description: Bestselling author and Harvard professor Arthur Brooks opens up about how enjoyment, satisfaction and meaning in life can increase a person's wellbeing.
title: Bestselling author explains the science of happiness: "You can do the work"

description: The much-hyped fight pitting the 58-year-old Tyson against Paul, 27, shattered records but was marred by tech glitches.

description: President-elect Donald Trum pardoned Steve Bannon in 2021 on federal charges related to the same scheme.
title: Steve Bannon set for New York trial starting Feb. 25, judge rules

description: Air pollution chokes New Delhi every winter, but this year's smog has already derailed everything from transport and road work to schools.
title: India's "severe plus" air pollution forces more dramatic safety measures

description: The Jennings Creek wildfire that's burned for 10 days along the New York-New Jersey border is now mostly contained, but conditions are still primed for fire in the Northeast. CBS News New York reporter Christina Fan has more.
title: Officials warn fire risk remains high in Northeast as Jennings Creek wildfire comes under control

description: President-elect Donald Trump has chosen Chris Wright, CEO of Liberty Energy and a vocal advocate of oil and gas development, to be his energy secretary. CBS News political correspondent Caitlin Huey-Burns has more on Wright and some of the other latest news with Trump's Cabinet picks.
title: Trump picks oil and gas executive Chris Wright for energy secretary

description: President Biden has given Ukraine the green light to use U.S.-provided long-range missiles for strikes deep within Russian territory, a U.S. official confirmed to CBS News on Sunday. The move is a major shift in U.S. policy that comes after months of lobbying from the Ukrainians. CBS News senior national security correspondent Charlie D'Agata and CBS News White House reporter Willie James Inman have more.
title: What to know about Biden letting Ukraine use long-range U.S. missiles against Russia

description: The sister of Aysenur Ezgi Eygi, an American activist killed in the Israeli-occupied West Bank, says her idealistic vision of the U.S. has been shattered.
title: Family of U.S. activist killed in West Bank still demanding answers

description: NHTSA unveils two investigations into recalls that may not have worked, just days after announcing civil fine against Ford for moving too slowly.
title: U.S. regulators initiate 2 probes into Ford recalls, including 113,000 Ford SUVs

description: Using home equity to pay off debt before the holidays could make sense for some, but not everyone.

description: On this edition of CBS Mornings Deals, we show you items that might just become essentials in your everyday life. Visit cbsdeals.com to take advantage of these exclusive deals today. CBS earns commissions on purchases made through cbsdeals.com.
title: Exclusive discounts from CBS Mornings Deals

description: Parenting expert Emily Oster joins "CBS Mornings Plus" to talk about how "hurried child syndrome" can be a cause of potential anxiety in kids.
title: How rushing kids may affect their mental health

description: Having visited more than 250 cities in 62 countries, Emmy-winning host Samantha Brown shares her top strategies to make holiday travel smoother and more affordable.
title: Travel expert on holiday tips to save time and money

description: With Republicans controlling Congress and the White House, President-elect Trump appears to have a clear path for his legislative goals. But Democrats can still use the filibuster to slow progress. Scott MacFarlane explains.
title: How the filibuster could shape Trump's legislative future

description: Ridley Scott's latest masterpiece revisits the world of ancient Rome with new characters and intense drama. The cast of "Gladiator II" talks to Nate Burleson on working with Scott and carrying forward the spirit of the iconic original.
title: Denzel Washington, Paul Mescal and Connie Nielsen on "Gladitors" legacy

description: "The Dish: Recipe" breaksdown a classic stuffing with a unique twist. Featuring rich, sausage-like flavors—without the meat—this dish from New York Times Cooking will be a quick holiday favorite.
title: "The Dish Recipe": Quick and easy stuffing recipe

description: Drowning in credit card debt? Consolidation does more than you might think.
title: 5 surprising credit card debt consolidation benefits to know

description: Harvard professor and bestselling author Arthur Brooks breaks down to David Begnaud how understanding enjoyment, satisfaction, and meaning can transform well-being.
title: Harvard professor Arthur Brooks on the science of happiness

description: New Jersey Rep. Mikie Sherrill, a Democrat, says she is running for governor in 2025.
title: Rep. Mikie Sherrill running for governor of New Jersey

description: Experts recommend four gold investments if you want to buy the precious metal before the new year.
title: These are the best gold investments to make before 2025, experts say

description: Since the election, CBS News has reported people who are Black have been receiving racist text messages. Hispanic and LGBTQ Americans have also reported receiving text messages. It is not known who is responsible but it's raising questions about how people behind the attacks know the race and sexual orientation of their victims.
title: How people in dozens of states were targeted with racist texts and what you can do

description: Government agencies are investigating the death of a Mexican gray wolf in Arizona. The animal is protected by the Endangered Species Act.
title: $103,500 reward offered after protected Mexican wolf's death in Arizona

description: President Biden lifted the restriction that will allow Ukraine to use U.S.-suplied missiles with a range of 190 miles against Russia. Also, new controversy over President-elect Trump's Cabinet picks. All that and all that matters in today's Eye Opener.
title: Eye Opener: Biden allows Ukraine to strike Russia with long-range, U.S.-supplied missiles

description: A Russian lawmaker calls President Biden's decision to let Ukraine fire U.S. missiles deep into Russia a "very big step toward the beginning" of a third world war.
title: Russia warns of world war after Biden's decision on missiles for Ukraine

description: The Kansas City Chiefs' dreams of an undefeated season were torn asunder Sunday as the Buffalo Bills were able to pull out a 30-21 win against the defending Super Bowl champions. CBS Sports NFL writer Shanna McCarriston joined CBS News to discuss this past Sunday in the National Football League.
title: Buffalo Bills end Kansas City Chiefs' quest for undefeated season

description: AAA expects the Thanksgiving travel season to be another record-breaker, which means packed planes and potential traffic troubles. Nearly 80 million Americans are expected to travel 50 miles or more.
title: What to know ahead of anticipated record-breaking Thanksgiving travel

description: President Biden is authorizing Ukraine to use U.S.-supplied long-range weapons to strike deep inside Russian territory, a U.S. official confirmed to CBS News. The Kremlin says the move by the Biden administration will further escalate tensions. BBC News correspondent Paul Adams and CBS News White House reporter Willie James Inman have more.
title: Biden allowing Ukraine to hit Russia with long-range, U.S.-supplied missiles

description: Multiple brands of bagged organic carrots have been linked to at least 40 E. coli cases and one death. The organic carrots grown by Grimmway Farms are no longer on grocery store shelves but they could still be in your fridge. The California-based producer supplies carrots to major brands like Trader Joe's, Wegman's, Good and Gather, which is available at Target, Nature's Promise and others.
title: Organic carrots recalled after E. coli outbreak leads to 1 death

description: Former U.S. Ambassador to Russia John Sullivan, who served under the Biden and Trump administrations, joins "CBS Mornings" to discuss the impact and timing of President Biden's approval of Ukraine using U.S.-made long-range weapons in Russia.
title: What to know about Russia-Ukraine war after approval of American-made weapons for Ukraine

description: Two people were killed and ten others wounded in two separate shootings about 45 minutes apart along a parade route packed with thousands of people in New Orleans. There's no word if the incidents are related and police haven't announced any arrests.
title: 2 killed, 10 hurt in separate New Orleans shootings

description: Spirit Airlines has filed for bankruptcy protection ​​following its failed merger with JetBlue, an engine recall that forced dozens of its jets to be grounded and weaker than expected sales. Spirit says operations will continue as normal for now and flights will not be impacted.
title: Spirit Airlines files for bankruptcy

description: Victoria Kjær Theilvig, an animal protection advocate who works in the diamond selling business, beat out Miss Nigeria at the end of the competition.
title: Victoria Kjær Theilvig of Denmark is crowned Miss Universe

description: Gazans say they'd welcome Trump making good on his vow to end the war, but not "at the expense of the Palestinian people."
title: Palestinians' hopes and fears as Trump heads back to the White House

description: Morley Safer met Danish architect Bjarke Ingels in New York City back in 2016, when the 41-year-old was handling over 60 major projects including Lego's new headquarters and a building for Google. At the time he was also involved in designing Two World Trade Center.
title: Architect Bjarke Ingels | 60 Minutes Archive

description: The arrests came after a murder victim's family received a large ransom request and $32,000 was paid in cryptocurrency.
title: 14 suspects linked to powerful cartel arrested in Spain murder probe

description: Spirit Airlines said Monday that it has filed for bankruptcy protection and will attempt to reboot as it struggles to recover from the pandemic-caused swoon in travel and failed mergers.
title: Spirit Airlines files for bankruptcy

description: President-elect Donald Trump tapped Republican Brendan Carr, an Elon Musk-backed critic of big tech, to lead the FCC, calling Carr a "warrior for Free Speech."
title: Trump taps Musk-backed big tech critic Brendan Carr to head FCC

description: Two people were killed and 10 wounded in two shootings along a New Orleans parade route and celebration attended by thousands, authorities said. There were no immediate arrests.
title: Shootings along New Orleans parade route leave 2 dead, 10 wounded

description: Trump has indicated that the revelations about the accuser and payment have not deterred him from Hegseth's selection as defense secretary.
title: Hegseth paid accuser but denies wrongdoing, attorney says

description: Russia hits Ukraine with massive missile and drone attack; Youth symphonies from U.S. and Mexico come together for performance
title: 11/17: CBS Weekend News
